meta.name: description
meta.content: MaryMagdalene - Exploring Medieval Mary Magdalene (and More) Online Project Description The goal of this project is of a twofold nature: in terms of research results, it will create an interactive online edition of a medieval Mary Magdalene legend transmitted in the Lower Rhine area; in terms of teaching practice, it will train graduate and undergraduate students in palaeography, editing, and coding.
